body.p: If the cursor hovers over a piece of equipment on a screen and a “lightning bolt” appears, click on the item to open a faceplate (popup window] that provides information about that specific device. The faceplates vary depending on the type of equipment. For example, the faceplates for a screw drive or dosing feeder are shown below, and include the ability to change operating modes, change parameter values, and view alarms for that particular device.
